divs: sighting detailsblack tiangle shape, white lights in corners, red pulsating light in underside center \ humming, low rumble sound. first seen higher, under cloud deck flying slowly sw to ne. saw again later in evening. much lower.. few hundred feet over tree tops going e to w slow speed but it was slowlw spinning counter clockwise as it flew. same humming \ low rumble
